author: Deleted User
content: Silly question time: On Voluntary Exits, Who's signing the transaction? the validator key? or the withdrawal key?

author: Deleted User
content: (looking at lighthouse code for the bit right now)

author: protolambda
content: regular signing key, signature is verified against validator pubkey, see https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/beacon-chain.md#voluntary-exits

author: Deleted User
